channel.title: CVE Feed for CA Technologies - A Broadcom Company -- CA Automic Workload Automation
channel.description: The latest CVEs for CA Technologies - A Broadcom Company -- CA Automic Workload Automation

item.title: CVE-2019-6504|2024-08-04T20:23:21.412Z -- ca%20technologies%20-%20a%20broadcom%20company -- ca%20automic%20workload%20automation
item.description: Insufficient output sanitization in the Automic Web Interface (AWI), in CA Automic Workload Automation 12.0 to 12.2, allow attackers to potentially conduct persistent cross site scripting (XSS) attacks via a crafted object.
